chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 13 is experiencing the following issue:
My package was not delivered to the guard, even though it's marked as delivered on the interface. There was no proof of receipt signed by either her - or me since I wasn't at home. Could you resolve the dispute quickly? If not, I'll open a complaint with PayPal, which I paid the order through.
Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile

The recipient of this order claims not to have received the order, even though the tracking shows up as delivered.

Dear ecomobile,

The customer has shared his non-receipt documents with this conversation.

He would like a new shipment.

Regards,
François from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Thank you for the documents. We have updated our logistics partner regarding this issue. However, please assist the customer in completing the CND from DPD. We have attached the template in this message.

Regards,
Xt

Dear ecomobile 

Can you send us the POD for this delivery?

Regards,

François from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare

I have attached the POD to this message. If the customer wishes to contest, please send us the CND from DPD. The template is attached in the previous message.

Regards,
SY

Dear ecomobile
 
Enclosed is the DPD document completed by the customer.

The customer would like a new shipment sent to a new address: 

Solveig GENÉ
12 allée de la comtesse de Ségur
94420 Le Plessis-Trévise

Thank you for helping us to satisfy the customer.

Regards,
François from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Thank you for your assistance! We would share the documents with our logistics partner to open an investigation. 

Regards,
SY

Hello ecomobile,

Without answer with a valid tracking link before the 25/05/2024 we will refund the customer.

Thank you for understanding,
Ornella from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, we do not have sufficient stock for a reshipment. We have processed a full refund for the customer instead. Sorry for the inconvenience caused.

Regards,
SY
